<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085989</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The George Moses Horton Project: Celebrating a triumph of literacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das George Moses Horton Projekt: Feiern 
eines Triumphes des Bildungsgrades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Projet de George Moïse Horton : 
Célébration d'un triomphe d'instruction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Projeto De George Moses Horton: 
Comemorando um triunfo do literacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Progetto George Moses Horton: 
Celebrazione del trionfo di literacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο George Moses Horton Project: 
Εορτασμός ενός θριάμβου της βασικής εκπαίδευσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Proyecto De George Moses Horton: 
Celebración de un triunfo de la instrucción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The only American poet to publish books of poems while living in slavery, George Moses Horton is an inspiration for the power of literacy in our lives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der einzige amerikanische Dichter, zum der Bücher
der Gedichte, beim Leben zu veröffentlichen in der Sklaverei, George 
Moses Horton eine Inspiration für die Energie des Bildungsgrades in 
unseren Lebensdauern ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le seul poèt américain pour éditer des livres 
des poésies tout en vivant dans l'esclavage, George Moïse Horton
est une inspiration pour la puissance de l'instruction en nos vies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O único poeta americano para publicar livros dos 
poemas ao viver no slavery, George Moses Horton é uma inspiração 
para a potência do literacy em nossas vidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'unico poet americano per pubblicare i libri dei 
poems mentre vive nello slavery, George Moses Horton è un'ispirazione
per l'potenza di literacy nelle nostre vite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μόνος αμερικανικός ποιητής για να δημοσιεύσει τα 
βιβλία των ποιημάτων ζωντανός στη σκλαβιά, George Moses 
Horton είναι μια έμπνευση για τη δύναμη της βασικής 
εκπαίδευσης στις ζωές μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El único poeta americano para publicar los libros
de poemas mientras que vive en esclavitud, George Moses Horton es una 
inspiración para la potencia de la instrucción en nuestras vidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>

ORG:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
